section.heading: Limitation on scope of subchapter.
section.text: This subchapter does not apply to:

para.text: An account established for a partnership, joint venture, or other organization for a business purpose;
An account controlled by one or more persons as an agent or trustee for a corporation, unincorporated association, or charitable or civic organization; or
A fiduciary or trust account in which the relationship is established other than by the terms of the account.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 202 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act).
